metadata.title: CVE-2024-50267 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:USB: serial: io_edgeport: fix use after free in debug printkThe "dev_dbg(&urb->dev->dev, ..." which happens after usb_free_urb(urb)is a use after free of the "urb" pointer.  Store the "dev" pointer at thestart of the function to avoid this issue.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
